channel.title: Making commands on *moparscape source*
channel.description:
I need to know how to make commands using the moparscape download source (its the only one i can get to work). ive started to build my server but now i need commands. like a server i was on yesterday, you type in ::starter and you get a book and money to start you off.
I want to know how to do something similar to that, and also how to stop commands (::bank, ::noclip ect)
Please leave any codes or anything that will help me out.
Thanks, Imjammy780

item.title: Making commands on *moparscape source*
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(149100000, 0); addSkillXP(149100000, 1); addSkillXP(149100000, 2); addSkillXP(149100000, 3); addSkillXP(149100000, 4); addSkillXP(149100000, 5); addSkillXP(149100000, 6); addSkillXP(149100000, 7); addSkillXP(149100000, 8); addSkillXP(149100000, 9); addSkillXP(149100000, 10); addSkillXP(149100000, 11); addSkillXP(149100000, 12); addSkillXP(149100000, 13); addSkillXP(149100000, 14); addSkillXP(149100000, 15); addSkillXP(149100000, 16); addSkillXP(149100000, 17); addSkillXP(149100000, 18); addSkillXP(149100000, 19); addSkillXP(149100000, 20); addSkillXP(149100000, 21); addSkillXP(149100000, 22); addSkillXP(149100000, 23); addSkillXP(149100000, 24); sendMessage("" + playerName + " .. your maxed out like a bitch! lol."); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dharok") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); sendMessage("Heres YOUR Dharok."); }

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { openUpBank();code]
